file.name: doc.yaml
file.content:
# TODO: terminar la documentaci√≥n.
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Secure webservices
  description: |
    ## Introduction

    This module allows calling any standard Etendo web service in the same way as calling the "/ws" endpoint, but using token authentication.

    This authentication method also allows defining the context for the calls by choosing the role and/or organization when requesting a token. It is also possible to renew a token to refresh the expiration date or change the role/organization.

    Besides the new authentication implementation, the module includes utilities for developers and useful web services, such as jsonDal (to access the OB Data Access Layer with json).

    ## Initial configuration

    It is necessary to configure the encryption key and the expiration time for the authentication
    tokens in the Client window with the System Administrator role.

    If the expiration time is equal to "0" the tokens do not expire.

    It is highly recommended to generate a random key with the "Generate key" button.
    
    ![screenshot](img/screen01.png "SWS Config")
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:8080/etendo
tags:
  - name: Login
    description: endpoints related with authentication
  - name: Dal
    description: webservice from data access layer.
paths:
  /sws/login:
    post:
      summary: Obtain authentication token
      tags:
        - Login
      description: |
        Obtains an authentication token (JWT) associated with an Etendo context (User, Role, Org, Warehouse) and the list of usable roles, organizations and warehouses.
        Both the lists of roles, organizations and warehouses can be hidden to simplify the request result.
      parameters:
        - name: showRoles
          in: query
          description: Show role list
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
            default: true
            example: true
        - name: showOrgs
          in: query
          description: Show Organization lists.
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
            default: true
            example: true
        - name: showWarehouses
          in: query
          description: Show Warehouse lists.
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
            default: true
            example: true
      requestBody:
        description: Username, password, role id, organization id, storage id. Only the first two are required.
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - username
                - password
              properties:
                username:
                  type: string
                  example: admin
                password:
                  type: string
                  example: admin
                role:
                  type: string
                  example: "0"
                organization:
                  type: string
                  example: "0"
                warehouse:
                  type: string
                  example: "0"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Ok
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/LogResp"
        401:
          description: No auth
  /sws/com.smf.securewebservices.obRest/{modelName}:
    get:
      summary: List records
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      tags:
        - Dal
      parameters:
        - name: modelName
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Name of the model to be obtained (field name in  AD_Table)
          schema:
            type: string
            example: Product
        - name: _startRow
          in: query
          description: First result, pagination use.
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
            example: "0"
        - name: _endRow
          in: query
          description: Last result, used for pagination. If _startRow es 0 y _endRow is 4, it will return the first 5 query results.
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
            example: 4
        - name: includeChildren
          in: query
          description: Includes children records.
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
            example: false
            default: true
        - name: where
          in: query
          description: Clause where in HQL.
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: purchase = true
        - name: orderBy
          in: query
          description: Clause order by in HQL
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: _selectedProperties
          in: query
          description: Fields to select separated by commas.
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: id, name
        - name: _noActiveFilter
          in: query
          description: If it is true, it will also search the non-active records.
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
            default: false
            example: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Array of object from Etendo.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: "#/components/schemas/Product"
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
    post:
      summary: Add/edit record
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      tags:
        - Dal
      requestBody:
        description: Username, password, role id, organization id, storage id. Only the first two are required.
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                data:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/NewProduct"
      parameters:
        - name: modelName
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Name of the model to be obtained (field name in AD_Table)
          schema:
            type: string
            default: Product
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Object created or edited
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Product"
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
  /sws/com.smf.securewebservices.obRest/{modelName}/{recordID}:
    get:
      summary: Get a record by ID
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      tags:
        - Dal
      parameters:
        - name: modelName
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Name of the model to be obtained (field name in  AD_Table)
          schema:
            type: string
            default: Product
        - name: recordID
          in: path
          required: true
          description: ID of the record to be obtained
          schema:
            type: string
            default: DA7FC1BB3BA44EC48EC1AB9C74168CED
        - name: includeChildren
          in: query
          description: Includes children records
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
            default: false
        - name: _selectedProperties
          in: query
          description: Fields to select separated by commas.
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            default: id, name
        - name: _noActiveFilter
          in: query
          description: If it is true, it will also search the non-active records.
          required: false
          schema:
            type: boolean
            default: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Requested object.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Product"
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
components:
  schemas:
    LogResp:
      type: object
      title: Login response
      properties:
        status:
          type: string
          example: success
        token:
          type: string
          example: eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJhdWQiOiJzd3MiLCJyb2xlIjoiMCIsIm9yZ2FuaXphdGlvbiI6IjAiLCJpc3MiOiJzd3MiLCJleHAiOjE1ODE1MjMxNTcsInVzZXIiOiIxMDAiLCJpYXQiOjE1ODE1MTU3Nzd9.ZyAwUz7B1xOuMJzrtt6LJo0O7UNi133W15Uv_RfW3IM
        roleList:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              id:
                type: string
                example: '0'
              name:
                type: string
                default: ''
                example: System Administrator
              orgList:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: string
                      example: '0'
                    name:
                      type: string
                      example: '*'
                    warehouseList:
                      type: array
                      items:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                            example: '0'
                          name:
                            type: string
                            example: '*'

      type: object
      properties:

          type: string
          default: ''
          example: Office supplies
        _entityName:

      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
